metadata.title: CVE-2018-11813 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
libjpeg 9c has a large loop because read_pixel in rdtarga.c mishandles EOF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg62 - 6b1-4ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1+esm2
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1+esm2
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1+esm2
libturbojpeg - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6b1-4ubuntu1+esm1').
libjpeg-turbo package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1+esm2').
